name: unamended
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If the words of a text, especially a law or a legal document, are unamended, they have not been changed: The bill is unlikely to pass into law unamended. The customer was referring to an old, unamended copy of the catalogue. Related word
amend
More examplesFewer examplesThe council is unlikely to approve the proposal in its unamended form.The committee will be considering an unamended version of the document.The House of Lords voted to approve an unamended version of the bill.
